projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

projects.title: ComposeCookBook
projects.description: A collection of all Jetpack compose UI components, Patterns, and samples to use Jetpack compose efficiently.

projects.title: ComposeWeather
projects.description: A simple weather application built completely with Jetpack compose using clean architecture.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience developing RESTful APIs using Django and DRF.
Explain your approach to optimizing database queries in Django.
How do you handle authentication and authorization in Django applications?
Explain how you would use Redis in a Django application to improve performance.
Have you used Celery for asynchronous task processing? If so, describe a scenario where you implemented it.
How do you approach writing unit and integration tests for Django applications?
Describe a challenging backend development problem you faced and how you solved it.
How do you ensure code quality and maintainability in a collaborative development environment?
